title: BBC Local Live: Merseyside and west Cheshire on Thursday 19 January 2017 - BBC News
summary: knowsley named as worst performing authority for secondary schools in england .
north west ambulance service requires improvement , inspectors say .
cheshire police to investigate abuse of 83 footballers .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates from merseyside and west cheshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back from 08:00 on friday with more news , sport , travel and weather updates from across the region .

documents.title: weather : cloudy night , drizzle on the way
text: overnight it will stay cloudy , with further patchy light rain and drizzle for some , particularly over the hills .
the cloud cover will keep the temperatures from falling too far , with most places staying frost-free .
highs of 9c .
more from bbc weather
author: Lucy Martin
BBC Weather

documents.title: shock after 'targeted ' shooting in stockbridge village
text: neighbours reacted with shock after a man was blasted in the leg and buttock in what police said was a `` targeted '' shooting in stockbridge village .
author: Liverpool Echo

documents.title: get involved with the fa people 's cup
text: ever dreamed of lifting a trophy on the pitch at wembley ?
well , here 's your chance .

get inspired has again teamed up with the football association to launch the 2017 fa people 's cup , a free five-a-side knockout competition that gives the people of england the chance to play in their version of the fa cup.watch as radio 1xtra dj nick bright shows his ( almost ) silky ball skills , while explaining how you can get involved - and for all the information you need , read our get inspired guide .
author: Get Inspired
Get Inspired

documents.title: untold stories of black seafarers wanted by museum
text: are your family from a seafaring background ?
merseyside maritime museum is running a special exhibition about the hidden story of britain 's black seafarers and their pioneering work , as well as the challenges they faced .
help us to tell the untold stories of black seafarers - find out how on the blog : # blacksalt # sankofapeople

documents.title: pay-and-display blitz to hit wirral
text: a pay-parking blitz is about to hit wirral with shopping streets , country parks and seafront promenades bearing the brunt .
author: Wirral Globe

documents.title: football : deulofeu can leave everton says koeman
text: winger gerard deulofeu can leave the toffees before the january transfer window closes in order to get more games , boss ronald koeman says .
koeman also said the future of england defender phil jagielka `` depends if there is interest from other clubs '' .
the toffees have rejected a bid from ac milan to take deulofeu , 22 , on loan for the remainder of the season .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: chester zoo launch elephant name vote
text: chester zoo are giving pachyderm lovers 24 hours to vote for the name of their latest elephant calf .
the calf was born earlier this week to mum sithami

documents.title: council to write off £ 660,000 debts
text: warrington borough council is set to write off around £ 660,000 in unpaid council tax and other debts .
author: Warrington Guardian

documents.title: football : nigeria eye young england striker lookman
text: nigeria want to persuade 19-year-old everton striker ademola lookman to play for them rather than england .
lookman was born in england but can play for nigeria through his parents .
he has already played for england under-19s and u20s but can switch allegiances because he is yet to play for the senior side .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: businesses reconnected after st helens power cut
text: power has been restored to businesses in st helens town centre following disruption to the electricity supply earlier .
church square shopping centre was temporarily closed during the cut .
however , traffic lights at chalon way west and linkway west a58 remain out of use .
motorists are advised to avoid the area .
the outage is believed to be linked to construction work at linkway west , the council says .

text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: axel the puppy 's first day as cheshire police dog
text: after a public vote to name their newest recruit , chief constable of cheshire police simon byrne has welcomed puppy axel to the force .

documents.title: power outage in st helens town centre
text: part of st helens town centre has been affected by a power cut this afternoon .
church square shopping centre is temporarily closed and traffic lights at chalon way west and linkway west a58 have also been affected .
motorists are advised to avoid the area .
the outage is believed to be linked to construction work at linkway west , the council says .

documents.title: power cut in st helens affecting town centre
text: we are aware of a # powercut in # wa9 # wa10 # sthelens .
our engineers are working to restore supplies .
sorry for the inconvenience .

documents.title: weather : mainly grey but dry afternoon
text: a mainly dry cloudy and grey afternoon with the odd spot of drizzle .
highs of 9c .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: cheshire police to probe abuse of 83 young footballers
text: more than 200 reports of historical sex abuse against 83 young footballers are being investigated by cheshire police .
cheshire constabulary said it had identified three suspects since it started investigating in november .
the force is yet to confirm the number of cheshire-based football clubs affected by the reports .

documents.title: young mum goes to hospital with bad back pain and leaves with new-born baby
text: new mum latisha bishop , 21 , went to hospital complaining of a bad back - and 48 hours later gave birth to a baby girl .
author: Liverpool Echo

documents.title: tyrers building £ 1m makeover revealed
text: developers have released images showing what the former tyrers building in st helens will look like after a £ 1m makeover .
merseyside-based luxor group bought the iconic building last year after the independent department store tyrers closed .
the five-storey building on bridge street is set to be redeveloped for housing and retail space .

documents.title: cheshire emergency services ranked highly in lgbt charity index
text: cheshire 's emergency services have been placed in the top 20 of stonewall 's workplace equality index .
the index is compiled by the equality charity every year and highlights those organisations which have done work `` to help make sure that every lgbt employee can be themselves in the workplace '' .
cheshire fire and rescue service were ranked as joint eighth and cheshire police were ranked 16th .
lloyds banking group were rated as the overall best employer for lgbt people .

documents.title: sir paul mccartney sues sony over beatles songs
text: it could become one of the most important legal battles in music - sir paul mccartney is suing sony over control of the beatles ' back catalogue .
the star has gone to a us court , seeking to regain the publishing rights to 267 of the band 's classic songs .
he 's been trying to get them back since the 1980s , when michael jackson famously out-bid him for the rights .
jackson 's debt-ridden estate sold the songs to sony last year , along with others including new york , new york .

sir paul 's legal case , filed in a manhattan court on wednesday , is over what is known as copyright termination - the right of authors to reclaim ownership of their works from music publishers after a specific length of time has passed .
author: BBC Entertainment and Arts

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: nwas chief 'accepts ' need for improvement after cqc report
text: the chief executive for the north west ambulance service nhs trust says he `` accepts '' comments from the care quality commission that the service requires improvement , but believes some issues have already been addressed .
the service was given a `` requires improvements '' rating in safety and leadership , but was rated good for being caring , effective and responsive .
the nwas , which receives more than 1.3 million calls a year , currently has a 16 % vacancy rate for paramedics , and has recently had to recruit 35 from europe .
i was extremely pleased to hear that the cqc believes our staff to be caring and compassionate and that we regard safety and quality as a priority .

we accept the comments in the report relating to improvements required for procedures , guidelines and training , however the inspection took place almost ten months ago and the majority of the points highlighted have already been addressed .

documents.title: knowsley 'taking positive action ' to deal with secondary schools underperformance
text: knowsley council says it is taking `` positive action to drive up standards '' in the borough 's secondary schools after figures published today revealed it has the highest percentage of underperforming secondary schools in the country .
the dfe looks at pupils ' performance throughout secondary school and their results across eight gcse qualifications .
all six of knowsley 's secondaries - four of which are academies - failed hit the targets , giving the authority a 100 % underperformance rate .
in a statement , knowsley council said :
we have been aware of these results since the summer and are naturally disappointed in the outcome .
we recently invested £ 1m to establish an education commission for knowsley , made up of local , regional and national education leaders .
the commission is focussing its work on the six secondary schools in knowsley to provide support and challenge to drive up standards and attainment levels .

documents.title: plymouth and liverpool fans unite to mark death of supporter
text: football fans united last night in a show of support for the family of a man who died during an fa cup match .
plymouth and liverpool fans stood and applauded in the 25th minute during a fa cup third round replay at home park .
daniel , 25 - who was quadriplegic , blind and had cerebral palsy - died in hospital during the first tie at anfield on 8 january .
his father kevin found out during the match and was comforted by stewards at the stadium .

documents.title: dfe reveals 100 % of knowlsey 's secondary schools are underperforming
text: department for education figures have revealed that all six of knowsley 's secondary schools are underperforming .

the figures also show underperformance , defined as being below the government 's floor standard , at 37.5 % of secondary schools in halton , 30 % in st helens , 29 % in liverpool , 15.8 % in sefton , 15 % in wirral and 5.3 % in cheshire west and chester .
warrington was shown to have no underperforming secondary schools .

the figures use a new measure of performance , which was recently introduced and is based on gcse results from grades a to g across eight subjects , known as attainment 8 , along with another measure , known as progress 8 .
author: Marc Gaier
Reporter, BBC Radio Merseyside

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: bishop james jones given freedom of liverpool for hillsborough work
text: the bishop who was a key figure in the campaign to uncover the truth about the hillsborough disaster is to receive the freedom of liverpool .
bishop james jones chaired the hillsborough independent panel , whose report led to the quashing of the 1989 tragedy 's inquest verdicts .
the cleric will be honoured later at a ceremony in the city .
bishop jones , 68 , was made knight commander last year for his services to the hillsborough inquiry .

documents.title: probe into stockbridge village suspected shooting
text: an investigation has been launched into a suspected shooting in stockbridge village .
a man in his 20s needed hospital treatment last night for injuries to his leg and buttock .
it is thought the incident happened in marled hey at about 19:00 .

documents.title: police at scene of 'peaceful protest ' in cheshire
text: cheshire police say they have increased patrols in the village of ince near ellesmere port , because of a protest .
the demonstration is thought to be taking place in the area of pool lane .
you may notice a police presence in the ince area , this is part of the policing of a protest currently ongoing & managing traffic affected .
police are present to facilitate a peaceful protest , ensuring others can continue in their legitimate business activities , or commuting .

documents.title: liverpool gas leak : engineers carrying out repairs
text: engineers from scottish power are continuing to carry out repair work , following a gas leak in liverpool city centre .
around 20 buildings had to be evacuated , after a gas line was broken on moss street yesterday afternoon .
it emerged an electricity cable had burnt through a gas main while work took place near a disused pub .
motorists are being advised to avoid london road and norton street , while the work is carried out this morning .

documents.title: roads : demonstration causing disruption in ince , cheshire
text: there is heavy traffic on pool lane in ince , cheshire from the a5117 junction because of a demonstration .
police are directing traffic .
latest from bbc travel
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: north west ambulance service 'requires improvement '
text: the north west ambulance service nhs trust has been told it `` requires improvement '' by a health regulator .
the care quality commission report was compiled after a five-day announced visit and a surprise inspection .
concerns included a high level of vacancies among front-line paramedics , the trust 's complaints policy and mental capacity assessments .
but the inspection also praised three areas of `` outstanding practice '' and the trust 's `` exceptionally caring '' staff .

documents.title: roads : street closure after gas leak in liverpool city centre
text: moss street in liverpool is closed in both directions between the islington junction and the london road junction because of a gas leak .
latest from bbc travel
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : cloudy and mainly dry
text: a mostly dry and cloudy day .
some light rain and drizzle at times .
highs of 8c .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live news coverage
text: hello from liverpool , i 'm here with all your news , sport , travel and weather updates from across merseyside and west cheshire today .
if you 've got a story you 'd like me to hear about or a photograph you 'd like to share , you can contact me on email , facebook or twitter .
author: Jenny Coleman
Reporter, BBC Local Live
